name: 2nd Edition of Euro-Global Climate Change Conference (2023)
content: Join us at the "2nd Edition of Euro-Global Climate Change Conference (EGCCC 2023)" presented by Magnus Group, taking place online from September 21-23, 2023\. With the theme "TACCTT: Embracing Innovative Technology to Confront Mounting Climatic Challenges," this Climate Change Conference welcomes participants from around the world. It serves as a platform for researchers and industry experts to share their ground-breaking research findings and advancements in the field of Climatology. Climate Change Symposium event will feature insightful keynote speeches, engaging plenary talks, and interactive panel discussions led by distinguished researchers and industry leaders. We extend a warm invitation to researchers, academics, clinicians, students, and industry professionals to submit their research abstracts and actively engage in the Climate Science Meeting. Prepare to exchange ideas, forge valuable connections with experts, and remain at the forefront of developments in tissue engineering and regenerative medicine. Save the date for September 2023, as we anticipate your valuable presence! Reach us at: Contact Email: climate@magnusconference.com Phone: +1 702 988-2320 WhatsApp: +1 (540) 709 1879 Website: https://magnusconferences.com/climate-change/ Abstract submission: https://magnusconferences.com/climate-change/submit-abstract Registration: https://magnusconferences.com/climate-change/register Social Media Links: Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Climatechangeconfer Twitter: https://twitter.com/climate\_summit YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCLtH0EIiRfFWaIOwuYL5IEw Upcoming Climate Conferences 2023 | Climate Change Conference | Climate Change Conferences | Climate Change Conference 2023 | Climate Change Conferences 2023 | Climate Change Congress | Climate Change Meetings | Climate Change Events | Climate Change Congress 2023 | Climate Change Event 2023 | International Earth Conferences 2023 | Global Climate Congress 2023 | Advanced Climate Change Conferences 2023 | Climate and Environment Conferences 2023 | Climate Temperature Conferences 2023 | Climate Events 2023 | Climate Change Conferences 2023 | Climate Conference 2023 | Ecosystem and Biodiversity Conferences 2023 | Global Climate Summit 2023 | International Climate change Expo 2023 | International Climate Forum 2023 | Climate Change Future Conferences 2023 | Earth Science Conferences Worldwide 2023 | Temperature Conferences 2023 | Climate Conferences 2023 | Climate Symposium 2023 | Climate Change Summit 2023 | Climate Expo 2023 | Climate Exhibition 2023 | Climate Forum 2023 |
